original_text: And he said, Go. And he sent her away for two months: and she went with her companions, and bewailed her virginity upon the mountains.
korean_text: 그가 이르되 가라 하고 두 달을 기한하고 그를 보내니 그가 그 여자 친구들과 가서 산 위에서 처녀로 죽음을 인하여 애곡하고

sentences.original_text: And he sent her away for two months:
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀를 두 달 동안 보냈고:

sentences.original_text: and she went with her companions,
and bewailed her virginity upon the mountains.
